alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Perry; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:14PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Martin, southeastern Johnson, northeastern Perry, Knott, Floyd, southeastern Breathitt, Pike and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1014 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Meta to near Pikeville to East McDowell to Noble. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pikeville, Coal Run Village, Craynor, Galveston, Raccoon, Chloe, Zebulon, Meta, Sidney and East McDowell around 1020 PM EDT. Wheelwright, Beaver, Buckhorn Hollow, Garden Village, Shelbiana, Ligon and Melvin around 1025 PM EDT. Kimper, Mcandrews and Huddy around 1030 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fishtrap Lake, Vest, Phyllis, Virgie, Marrowbone, Hindman, Tina, Carrie, Yellow Mountain, Soft Shell, Belcher, Pippa Passes, Leburn, Rockhouse, Coleman, Mouthcard, Garner, Fedscreek, Biggs, Jamboree and Board Tree. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Kentucky Highway 3 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 4. Kentucky Highway 3 in Johnson County Kentucky Highway 80 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 14. Kentucky Highway 80 in Knott County between mile markers 1 and 20. U.S. Highway 119 in Pike County between mile markers 1 and 20. U.S. Highway 23 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 21. U.S. Highway 23 in Pike County between mile markers 9 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Martin; Perry; Pike
